channel.title: Series on hylixen's La La Land
channel.description: Recent content in Series on hylixen's La La Land

item.title: OpenCV image IO
item.description: Opencv contains multiple modules for image processing,to use them the relative hpp headers files should be included. core section defines the basical buliding blocks of the library.

item.title: Efficient Graph-Based Image Segmentation
item.description: Abstract This paper developed an efficient segmentation algorithm (time complexity O(nlogn) ) based on graph representation of image and MST(Kruskal’s algorithm) using a predicate for measuring the boundary between regions.

item.title: Endianness
item.description: big endian and little endian When storing multi-byte objects, the bytes order varies from the architecture of hardware as big endian and little endian.

item.title: Minimum Spanning Tree
item.description: Definition Spanning tree is a subgraph(every edge belongs to G) of an undirected and connected graph G = (V,E) that spans G (it includes every vertex of G).

item.title: R-CNN
item.description: Origin The Image recognition has four categories of tasks: classification:Juge the object classes location:find the object location detection:Judge and locate the objects segementation: Instance-level and Scene-level to classify pixel between objects and scene In detection tasks,the length of output layer is variable for occurrences of the objects is random.

item.title: hugo images in markdown

item.title: About
item.description: About This is the Hylixen’s personal blog. All articles in this site is lisensed by CC BY 4.0 CN,for reproducing you may contact me by sakurafallingworld@outlook.
